scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.test: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c yellow,cyan "npm --prefix backend run test" "npm --prefix frontend run test:run"
scripts.test:watch: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c yellow,cyan "npm --prefix backend run test:watch" "npm --prefix frontend run test:watch"
scripts.coverage: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c yellow,cyan "npm --prefix backend run coverage" "npm --prefix frontend run coverage"
